teal.math

Class RectangularPlane

  • java.lang.Object
    • teal.math.Plane
      • teal.math.RectangularPlane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GridIterator, VectorIterator

    public class RectangularPlane
extends Plane
implements GridIterator
    Creates a plane with special properties.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.4 $
    Author:
    Andrew McKinney, Phil Bailey, Michael Danziger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RectangularPlane()
      Creates a standard plane in the xy plane, unit length on a side, with normal along the z axis.

      RectangularPlane(javax.vecmath.Tuple3d a, javax.vecmath.Tuple3d b, javax.vecmath.Tuple3d c)
      Creates a RectangularPlane from the three specified points, normal is generated using right-hand rule ( counter-clockwise ), the rectangular bounds are defined by (a.x,a.y, zprojected ) and ( c.x,c.y, zprojected).

    • Constructor Detail

      • RectangularPlane

        public RectangularPlane()
        Creates a standard plane in the xy plane, unit length on a side, with normal along the z axis.

      • RectangularPlane

        public RectangularPlane(javax.vecmath.Tuple3d a,
                        javax.vecmath.Tuple3d b,
                        javax.vecmath.Tuple3d c)
        Creates a RectangularPlane from the three specified points, normal is generated using right-hand rule ( counter-clockwise ), the rectangular bounds are defined by (a.x,a.y, zprojected ) and ( c.x,c.y, zprojected). The vector b is used to specify the plane, but is not retained, it does not have to define a rectangular vertex.

      • RectangularPlane

        public RectangularPlane(javax.media.j3d.Bounds bounds)
        Creates a rectangle using a Bounds object bounds. If bounds is an instance of a Bounding Box, the rectangle created is in the xy plane using the upper and lower bounds of the box in the xy plane, and a value for the z-coordinate of the rectangle which is the average of the upper and lower bound z coordinates. If bounds is an instance of a Bounding Sphere, the rectangle is in the xy plane centered on the center of the sphere such that the sphere projected onto the xy plane is contained within the rectangle, and a value for the z-coordinate based on the z-coordinate of the bounding sphere.

    • Method Detail

      • setBounds

        protected void setBounds(javax.media.j3d.Bounds bounds)

      • set

        public void set(javax.vecmath.Tuple3d a,
                javax.vecmath.Tuple3d b,
                javax.vecmath.Tuple3d c)
        Description copied from class: Plane
        Sets three specified points a, b, and c on the plane, and computes the normal and distance of the plane from the origin along the normal to the plane. The normal to the plane is given by e1 cross e2, where the vector e1 is (a - b), and the vector e2 is (c - b). The point on the plane in the point normal form is set to a.
        Overrides:
        set in class Plane
